channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16171] Fix the potential problems in TestHCM.testConnectionCloseAllowsInterrupt
item.description: TestHCM.testConnectionCloseAllowsInterrupt is not stable in QA runs, and always failed.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: A small fix without the link for review board.
